mapper.select: SELECT drl.id, drl.daily_limit as dailyLimit, drl.monthly_limit as monthlyLimit, drl.single_limit as singleLimit, drl.description, u.name as adminName, drl.is_active as isActive, drl.created_at as createdAt, drl.updated_at as updatedAt FROM default_remittance_limit drl LEFT JOIN user u ON drl.admin_id = u.id
mapper.update: UPDATE default_remittance_limit SET daily_limit = #{dailyLimit}, monthly_limit = #{monthlyLimit}, single_limit = #{singleLimit}, description = #{description}, admin_id = #{adminId}, updated_at = NOW()
